description: Give your homemade sausage rolls a lift with this tasty pork, apple and fennel sausage roll recipe. This is the perfect finger food to serve at parties.
keywords: Pork dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Fakeaway,Apple,Mince,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork, Apple & Fennel Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 sheets Woolworths puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 3 baking trays with baking paper.
Place pork and sausage mince in a large bowl. Add apple, thyme, sage, salt, fennel seeds and 1 egg, and mix to combine.

Cut pastry sheets in half to form rectangles. Place one-twelfth of the mince mixture along 1 long pastry edge. Roll up pastry to enclose filling. Cut each roll into 5 pieces and place, seam-side down, on tray. Repeat with remaining mince mixture and pastry.
Beat remaining egg in a small bowl. Brush pastry with egg and sprinkle with poppy seeds. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve with tomato sauce.
